content: halloween is around the corner which means it s time to crochet some fun fast and cute accessories these diy fox or cat ears are so adorable and easy to make and they use very little yarn making them a great stashbuster project what better way to top off your fox or cat costume these headbands are great for both kids and adults costumes the pattern calls for medium weight yarn and uses the chain and single_crochet pattern includes a full/detailed list of supplies notes abbreviations etc the difficulty level for this pattern is easy finished size each ear measures about 2 5 inches length exact gauge is not essential to this project
